description.english: Destroy 20 active cleaning bots in a single save
Tweak the Chaincoil to a distance of 3 meters
Charge the ElectroDOT to a shocking 3x the starting damage
Reduce a Scrap Magnet to spare parts. Turns out bullets are magnetic too!
Take on the king of the ring by performing a K.O. on a Boxer
Make an Aquadragoon swim with the fishes. Who knew water doesn't agree with robotics?
Take down a Warden. Someone has to pay for that hole in the wall!
Never leave a job half finished

displayName.english: Where ya going, ya big drip?

description.english: Bring chaos to an Umibozu. No way, I can't believe this!
Make the Hunter become the hunted.
Fight through a Prototype Production Vault and make it out alive. Surely this counts as spawn camping?
Beat off the hordes at the Isolation Security Cells exit and journey deeper into the prison
Get deciphering
Someone is trying to get a message out
Tune the Plasma Imbuser to double the starting damage
Squeeze enough Particle Compression Pellets in the shell to double the starting amount
Concentrate your Spread Magnet into a concentrated beam of robot-death
Dramatically increase your Ricochet Module odds
Wipe out a total of 10,000 bots across playthroughs
Travel a total of 10,000 meters in a single save
The Decrypter is yours
Exit the Isolation Security Cells without destroying a single bot
Destroy a security camera. That'll show 'em!
Destroy 5 security cameras. Now it's a rebellion!
Destroy 10 security cameras. Property damage is fun!
Destroy 25 security cameras. I guess you must really hate being watched?
Destroy a whopping 500 security cameras. If you want privacy, you have to put the work in!
Collect your first Datapad. It's easy, right?
Collect 5 Datapads by checking every slightly dark corner
Collect your first hidden log...but can you read it yet?
Collect 5 hidden logs...surely there must be a way to read them?

displayName.english: Hey Cousin, Want To Go Bowling?

description.english: Collect your first Audiolog, containing some probably-not-important information

displayName.english: Do You Hear The Voices Too?

description.english: Collect 5 Audiologs, filled with further useless information
Investigate a strange room near an energy generator. Maybe that door was locked for a reason?
Visit 50 Cell rooms
Visit 100 Cell rooms
Visit 200 Cell rooms
Visit 300 Cell rooms
Visit 400 Cell rooms
Visit 500 Cell rooms. Are you even trying to get out anymore?
Visit 50 Hydro rooms
Visit 100 Hydro Rooms
Visit 200 Hydro rooms
Visit 300 Hydro rooms
Visit 400 Hydro rooms
Visit 500 Hydro rooms. You must really love the water, huh?
Visit 50 Tech rooms
Visit 100 Tech rooms
Visit 200 Tech rooms

displayName.english: Do Protodroids Dream of Electric Sheep?

description.english: Visit 300 Tech rooms
Visit 400 Tech rooms
Visit 500 Tech rooms. Enough green glow for a lifetime.
Visit 50 Service Access rooms
Visit 100 Service Access rooms
Visit 200 Service Access rooms
Visit 300 Service Access rooms
Visit 400 Service Access rooms
Visit 500 Service Access rooms. Did you service even a single thing along the way?
Visit your first Upgrade room
Visit 5 Upgrade rooms
Visit 10 Upgrade rooms
Visit 50 Upgrade rooms
Visit 100 Upgrade rooms. Locked. Loaded. Ready bring death and destruction.
Destroy 500 Protodroids
Pick on the little guy 5000 times
Rid the world of 50,000 cowards
Exterminate 100,000 cannon fodder, a truly stunning annihilation of the PU-0100/PU-0110 type "Protodroid" unit. Just what the doctor ordered.
Spot and destroy 25 Luxmeld-Snipers.
Stop the broadcasting of 25 Radio Bots
Demote 25 Sergeants from alive robots to dead robots
Blow up 25 Missile Bots. Surely giving them missiles in a tight confined space is a bad idea?
Extinguish the spark of 25 Whiplash units
Manually initiate a Shotgun reload 500 times
Reach the maximum amount of Adrenaline
Use the highly requested dedicated melee button to deal 5000 damage. Are we happy now?
Dive into a body of water 100 times
Dive into a body of water 250 times
Embrace your inner mermaid by entering the water 500 times
Load 100 shells into the Shotgun
Load 250 shells into the Shotgun
Chamber a total of 500 shells into the Shotgun. Well, the autoloader chambered them, but you gave it the shell to do so.
Interact with 100 buttons
Press 250 buttons and switches. You probably didn't even know what they did when you pressed them.
Spend 60 seconds on 90% or higher Adrenaline
Utterly destroy 10 Bosses in one on one combat
Teach the ways of violence by destroying 50 Bosses
Send 100 Bosses to the scrap pile. They're just a chunk of cheesy hardware anyway.
Discover a modelling wonder, and appreciate the artist
Cause a whopping 50,000 damage to anything and everything that you feel annoys you
Take a total of 50,000 damage. Ouch!
Get the Plasma Imbuser upgrade for the first time
Get the Chaincoil upgrade for the first time
Get the Electro.D.O.T. upgrade for the first time
Get the Ricochet Module upgrade for the first time
Get the Spread Magnet upgrade for the first time
